SEARCH
Module FloWeekTracker

Package com.floweektracker.main

package com.floweektracker.main
This package contains the main classes and functions for the FloWeekTracker application. It includes the core functionality:
  • Creates the main window for application.
  • Initializes and displays the main panel upon application launch.
  • Defines listeners for user interactions on the main panel
  • Manages the information panel to provide detailed application information
  • Class
    Description
    ButtonsText
    Represents the text displayed on JButtons in the main panel.
    InfoPanelUI
    Represents UI of the InfoPanelUI.infoPanel, which shows to the user information about database or planner using.
    Main
    Represents the Main instance and serves as the entry point for the application.
    MainListeners
    Represents the UI handling for instances of Main, MainPanelUI and InfoPanelUI, managing user interactions and events within the panels.
    MainPanelUI
    Represents the UI of the main panel displayed to the user after launching the application.
